Appearance

The ML4W Dotfiles for Hyprland

An advanced and full-featured configuration for the dynamic tiling window manager Hyprland including an easy to use installation script for Arch and Fedora based Linux distributions.

Get Started
Install
GitHub ↗

One Script to Rule Them All

Includes a powerful installation script to automate everything on Arch or Fedora based systems.

For Arch & Fedora (more coming soon)

Fully compatible with both Arch and Fedora, with intelligent behavior based on the detected system.

Dynamic Themes & Desktop

Experience a complete desktop with Hyprland, dynamic material themes, and deep customization via dotfiles.

Easy to Customize

Comes with helpful graphical apps to configure your setup, change themes, and tweak your environment.

Setup ​

Get started by running the installation command in your terminal:

For Arch-based systems:

sh
bash -c "$(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mylinuxforwork/dotfiles/main/setup-arch.sh)"

For Fedora-based systems:

sh
bash -c "$(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mylinuxforwork/dotfiles/main/setup-fedora.sh)"
